Body:
r1 = R1[:3]
r2 = R2[:3]
if not norm is None:
    NV = norm
else:
    NV = np.cross(r1, r2)
NV /= np.linalg.norm(NV)
Zeros = np.isclose(NV, 0.0)
if np.sum(Zeros) == 3:
    raise AttributeError('The two plane vectors are equivalen, {}, {}!'.
        format(r1, r2))
if np.sum(Zeros) == 2 or np.sum(Zeros) == 1:
    if Zeros[0] == True:
        V1 = np.array([1.0, 0.0, 0.0])
        V2 = np.cross(NV, V1)
    elif Zeros[1]:
        V1 = np.array([0.0, 1.0, 0.0])
        V2 = np.cross(NV, V1)
    else:
        V1 = np.array([0.0, 0.0, 1.0])
        V2 = np.cross(NV, V1)
else:
    V1 = r1
    V2 = r2
V1 = _tools.LengthOrder(V1)
V2 = _tools.LengthOrder(V2)
return V1, V2
